item.title: GPS Walkthrough 1 — Overview
item.dc:creator: Manuel
item.description: This article is step 1 of the GPS walkthrough series. Here we give an overview over the whole post series and introduce every step required to get from a raw GPS signal to a position fix. The main results are shown while detailed analysis and explanations are following in later posts.

item.title: GPS Walkthrough – A Journey from Radio Wave to Position Fix
item.dc:creator: Manuel
item.description: For other articles in this series, have a look at the GPS walkthrough index.

item.title: Geodesics on Curved Surfaces
item.dc:creator: Manuel
item.description: In this post, I try to find and illustrate geodesics on 2-D curved surfaces that are embedded in 3-D space. Due to a specific question from a friend of mine, the main goal is to find closed geodesics on a Möbius strip.

item.title: Polygon Smoothing Riddle
item.dc:creator: Manuel and Laura
item.description: A random polygon evolves into an ellipse if we iteratively generate a new polygons with its edges being the center of the previous polygon: https://www.jasondavies.com/random-polygon-ellipse/
